question:
Write a letter to the penfriend and introduce yourself. Tell them what you like doing in your free time. 
Ask your penfriend to tell you about their hobbies and interests.
text: My teacher "Mr. Iqubal Hossain" suggested me to write a letter to you because I am looking for a penfriend. I would like to know if you are also interested to write me.

I am 35 years old and living in Bashundhara Residential Area, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Currently I am working as a Senior Lead Engineer in Grameenphone which is number 1 telecommunication operator in Bangladesh. I have completed my bachelor degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Daffodil International University (DIU) and masters in Information Systems Security from Bangladesh University of Professionals (BUP).

During the free time, I like to do outdoor sports like Cricket and football. I love to do batting than bowling in cricket and I prefer to play in central defence in football. I do running or cycling for five days each week. I am involved in different cycling and running group and we participate in different events. I also like to spend time with my family. In every quarter I along with my friends or family, we go to visit different area like Coxbazar, Syhlet and other historical area in Bangladesh.
Well, I hope you will like to write me. I really look forward to you to know about yourself, your hobbies and what you like to do on your free time.
